document.heading: Teacher Retirement Incentive Program Temporary Amendment Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-184, the “Teacher Retirement Incentive Program Temporary Amendment Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-793, and was retained by Council. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 20, 2004, and May 4, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 21, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-434 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-184 became effective on September 8, 2004.
